briefdescription.para: What type of matrix is this?
What kind of ordering is it following?
Number of total values in matrix.
Elements between successive rows when row-major.
Number of lower diagonals on a banded matrix.
Number of upper diagonals on a banded matrix.
Gets the type of storage of this matrix.
Gets the ordering of this matrix.

simplesect.para: Number of rows of the matrix.
Number of rows of the matrix.
Number of values of the matrix.

detaileddescription.para: Leading dimension of the data array is the number of elements between successive rows (for row major storage) in memory. Most of the cases, the leading dimension is the same as the number of columns.

simplesect.para: Number of zeros of the matrix.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of non-zero values.

simplesect.para: Number of non-zero values of the matrix.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of null values.

simplesect.para: Number of null values of the matrix.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of non-null values.

simplesect.para: Number of non-null values of the matrix.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of lower diagonals.
Gets the number of upper diagonals.
Sets the storage type of the matrix.
Sets the ordering of the matrix.
Sets the number of rows of the matrix.
Sets the number of columns of the matrix.
Sets the number of zero values of the matrix that matter.

xrefdescription.para: -nan assigned on construction time due to num_values_ being 0.

briefdescription.para: Sets the number of zero values of the matrix that DO NOT matter.

xrefdescription.para: -nan assigned on construction time due to num_values_ being 0.

briefdescription.para: Increases the number of values that equal zero but with meaning.

xrefdescription.para: Review the definition of sparse matrices properties.

briefdescription.para: Increases the number of values that equal zero but with no meaning.

briefdescription.para: Definition of the representation of a matrix in the MTK.

detaileddescription.para: Definition of the representation for the matrices implemented in the MTK.
